content: end round 33 k1 mc k 1 cc to end round 34 k 1 cc k 1 mc k 2 cc to end round 35-39 k cc to end round 40 k 1 cc k 1 mc k 2 cc to end round 41 k 1 mc k 1 cc to end round 42 k1 cc k 1 mc to end round 43 k 1 mc k 1 cc k 2 mc to end round 44 k 3 mc k 1 cc to end round 45 k 1 mc k 1 cc k 2 mc to end round 46 k mc to end round 47 k 3 mc k 1 cc to end break cc yarn leaving a 6 15 cm tail to weave in later for size s k 50 k2tog to end 102 sts on the next round start crown shaping for size m knit to end on the next round start crown shaping © anya hawkins 2025 for pattern support contact knitsbyhawkins@gmail com this pattern is for personal use do not sell this pattern or items made from it for size l knit to end repeat last round 1 more time next round k 56 k2tog to end 114 sts on the next round start crown shaping for size xl knit to end repeat last round 5 more times on the next round start crown shaping crown shaping change to dpns 1 long circular or 2 short circulars when there are not enough stitches to work on 16 40 сm circular needle for size s round 1 k 7 s2kp k 14 s2kp repeat to last 7 sts k 7 90 sts round 2 knit to end round 3 k 6 s2kp k 12 s2kp repeat to last 6 sts k 6 78 sts round 4 knit to end round 5 k 5 s2kp k 10 s2kp repeat to last 5 sts k 5 66 sts round 6 knit to end round 7 k 4 s2kp k 8 s2kp repeat to last 4 sts k 4 54 sts round 8 knit to end round 9 k 3 s2kp k 6 s2kp repeat to last 3 sts k 3 42 sts round 10 knit to end round 11 k 2 s2kp k 4 s2kp repeat to last 2 sts k 2 30 sts round 12 knit to end round 13 k 1 s2kp k 2 s2kp repeat to last 1 st k 1 18 sts round 14 knit to end round 15 s2kp to end 6 sts for size m round 1 k 8 s2kp k 15 s2kp repeat to last 7 sts k 7 96 sts round 2 knit to end round 3 k 7 s2kp k 13 s2kp repeat to last 6 sts k 6 84 sts round 4 knit to end round 5 k 6 s2kp k 11 s2kp repeat to last 5 sts k 5 72 sts round 6 knit to end round 7 k 5 s2kp k 9 s2kp repeat to last 4
